title: How do doctors feel about naturopaths and chiropractors?
description: Answer: You have the opportunity to do some research yourself....true "research." You are able to access (for free) the result of countless scientific studies by accessing the website of the National Institutes of health, NIH. Just google "NIH" and then go to the site.
